unnormalised: **Home Loan Schemes Heating Up This Festive Season!**
normalised: Home Loan Schemes Heating Up This Festive Season!

unnormalised: Hey folks, Diwali is around the corner and banks are pulling out all the stops! Home loan schemes are looking pretty sweet right now.
normalised: Hey folks, Diwali is around the corner and banks are pulling out all the stops! Home loan schemes are looking pretty sweet right now.

unnormalised: ICICI Bank is reportedly offering interest rates starting as low as 8.5% - that's lower than your uncle Sharma's wedding feast budget!
normalised: I C I C I Bank is reportedly offering interest rates starting as low as eight point five percent - that's lower than your uncle Sharma's wedding feast budget!

unnormalised: SBI is also in the game with some tempting offers aimed specifically at first-time homebuyers in Tier 2 cities like Kochi and Patna. Think smaller EMIs to make that Onam celebration a little less stressful.
normalised: S B I is also in the game with some tempting offers aimed specifically at first-time homebuyers in Tier two cities like Kochi and Patna. Think smaller E M I s to make that Onam celebration a little less stressful.

unnormalised: But wait, there's more! HDFC is dangling fee waivers for women borrowers and those looking at properties within a 10 km radius of the city center.
normalised: But wait, there's more! H D F C is dangling fee waivers for women borrowers and those looking at properties within a a ten kilometer radius of the city center.

unnormalised: Rumor has it, even some smaller NBFCs are getting in on the action, so shop around before you commit.
normalised: Rumor has it, even some smaller N B F C s are getting in on the action, so shop around before you commit.

unnormalised: Remember, a lower interest rate isn't everything. Factor in processing fees, pre-payment penalties, and all that jazz.
normalised: Remember, a lower interest rate isn't everything. Factor in processing fees, pre-payment penalties, and all that jazz.

unnormalised: Do your homework, and you might just be biting into that first plate of biryani in your new home sooner than you think!
normalised: Do your homework, and you might just be biting into that first plate of biryani in your new home sooner than you think!
